attribute.description: Accesses a 'dynamic' attribute of a variable.

block.description: Displays a block from another template.

constant.description: Returns the constant value for a given string.

country_timezones.description: Returns the names of the timezones associated with a given country code.

cycle.description: Cycles on an array of values.

date.description: Converts an argument to a date to allow date comparison.

dump.description: Dumps information about a template variable.

html_classes.description: Returns a string by conditionally joining class names together.

include.description: Returns rendered content of a template.

max.description: Returns the biggest value of a sequence of values. When called with an object, it ignores keys and only compares values.

min.description: Returns the lowest value of a sequence of values. When called with an object, it ignores keys and only compares values..

parent.description: Renders the contents of the parent block when overriding a block.

random.description: Returns a random value depending on the supplied parameter.

range.description: Returns a list containing an arithmetic progression of integers.

source.description: Returns the content of a template without rendering it.

template_from_string.description: Loads a template from a string. You can also specify a template name that will be part of related error message.
